title: Umm where did i go wrong?
body: went 16/2/4 with 275 cs, i destroyed 5 towers and only get A-......

replies.body:
I heard that Mastery Score is based on gold earned and game time.

Makes sense since supports don't go around CSing or killing much.
supports hardly get s's unless you cuck your adc
It makes it even funnier when you see a support with mastery 6 or 7. Cos they didn't get it by supporting very well :P
I dunno it was games like 5/1/27 with <50 cs that got me M7 on Nami.
I've found if you get anything below 6 cs/min you're not going to get an S in a solo lane

Riot bases ranking stats on your performance in more than the ways you said. They include, kda, gold / min, cs / min, map presence (meaning going into other lanes and rotating), objectives, kill participation and probably, many more

https://oce.op.gg/summoner/userName=cia%C3%B4

175 cs.

thats pretty much it friend. 36 min game and sub 200 cs is not "S worthy".

If you had 275 cs you probably would have gotten S+.

> [{quoted}](name=BarryButcher,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=6lcU5LWZ,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-02-28T04:56:28.594+0000)

Every person likes to boast a bit.
it's based off gold earned and also averages with that champ. the guy u played is probably super busted or the game went for like 40-50 minutes
